description: Cirkula is an innovative platform designed to help the food industry minimize waste by connecting businesses with surplus food to consumers. Founded in 2019, Cirkula aims to enhance sustainability by preventing perfectly good food from ending up in landfills, where it emits harmful greenhouse gases. With a growing network of over 600 partners, Cirkula is committed to expanding its impact across Latin America, promoting both food efficiency and environmental responsibility. The platform is looking to diversify its offerings to include other perishable goods beyond food, such as flowers and medicines, and is focused on building a strong network of partners to enhance its impact.
name: Cirkula
